content.2/f Abigail 1000/w rainy/t 1200 1900/z w: AbigailFlute/-1000 -1000/farmer 34 32 1 Abigail 47 31 2/skippable/ambientLight 160 140 10/specificTemporarySprite abbyAtLake/animate Abigail false true 612 16 17 18 19/viewport 46 31 clamp true/pause 17900/move farmer 13 0 0/stopMusic/playMusic rain/pause 500/stopAnimation Abigail/faceDirection Abigail 2/emote Abigail 16/speak Abigail "$q 32 null#@！你怎么站在雨里啊？$7#$r 32 0 Event_Rain_1#我在干活儿#$r 32 50 Event_Rain_2#我在享受这种天气#$r 32 10 Event_Rain_3#我还想问你呢"/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 1250/speak Abigail "我想一个人在这儿静静。$8"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1600/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Abigail "你陪我也好！"/pause 500/emote Abigail 40/speak Abigail "你都淋透了……来，站到树底下。"/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 2/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 3000/speak Abigail "看着雨帘在寂静的湖面上飘荡……这种感觉难以形容。$8"/pause 650/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 600/playSound dwop/showFrame 98/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 3/emote Abigail 16/pause 800/speak Abigail "嘿！迷你竖琴！$h#$b#你身上到处充满惊喜，@。我很惊讶。"/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 900/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 700/faceDirection Abigail 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/showFrame Abigail 16/pause 500/showFrame 98/pause 2000/playMusic AbigailFluteDuet/pause 1250/animate Abigail false true 612 16 17 18 19/animate farmer false true 308 99 98 98 99 100 100/pause 10000/viewport move 1 0 18000/pause 20000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/end
content.8/f Maru 1500/w sunny/t 2100 2340: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 23 29 3 Maru 14 29 3/skippable/bgColor 0 0 0/changeToTemporaryMap NightSceneMaruMap false/ambientLight 0 0 0/viewport 14 23 true/pause 2000/playSound leafrustle/pause 200/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 400/emote Maru 8/pause 800/move farmer -5 0 3/speak Maru "@！没想到这么晚，还能在这儿遇到你。"/faceDirection Maru 3/pause 1000/speak Maru "这会儿的夜空好美啊。"/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "来，我想给你看样儿东西。"/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Maru "来，瞧一眼。"/move Maru 0 1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 200/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 1200/playMusic spaceMusic/speak Maru "$q 40 null#你看到的是什么？#$r 40 30 Event_Space1#一颗美丽的星球。#$r 40 -30 Event_Space2#一片漆黑的深渊。"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Maru "等人们能够登上这些星星的时候，你我早就不在人世了……$8"/emote farmer 28/pause 400/speak Maru "我想这就是身为人类所不好的一点，对不对？"/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 1200/faceDirection Maru 2/emote Maru 40/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 0/speak Maru "@，呃……$8"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1500/speak Maru "算了……$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 800/speak Maru "来，我给你指双子星系……"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3 true/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 800/specificTemporarySprite maruTelescope/viewport move 0 -1 16000/pause 16000/globalFade .003/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/message "真是好美的夜晚啊！玛鲁让我见识了一些新东西……"/pause 1000 /stopAnimation farmer/changeLocation Mountain/end
content.26/f Linus 1000/w sunny/t 2000 2400: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 18 8 1 Linus 29 8 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite linusCampfire/viewport 29 7 clamp true/move farmer 8 0 1/faceDirection Linus 3/emote Linus 32/speak Linus "@！过来烤火哇。感觉很棒呢。"/pause 400/move farmer 2 0 2/move farmer 0 1 1/move Linus 1 0 2/move Linus 0 1 3/pause 1500/speak Linus "我一直希望你能过来找我。"/pause 500/emote Linus 28/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 2/pause 500/showFrame Linus 19/pause 500/speak Linus "我想为一开始对你的怀疑道歉。$s#$b#大多数人对我都不好，所以我就变得特别敏感。$s"/pause 500/showFrame Linus 0/faceDirection Linus 3/speak Linus "但你对我真的很好。你是个非常特别的人。$h#$b#我把你当作好朋友。"/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 3/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/faceDirection Linus 3/move Linus 0 -1 3/move Linus -1 0 0/speak Linus "嘿，我想给你看件东西。进来。$h"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move Linus 0 -1 0/playSound grassyStep/warp Linus -10 -10/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound grassyStep/warp farmer -10 -10/playMusic none/pause 1500/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/playSound dirtyHit/pause 1200/playSound slimeHit/pause 300/playSound slimeHit/pause 300/playSound slimeHit/pause 300/playSound slimeHit/pause 600/playSound slimedead/pause 1000/speak Linus "瞧。你看见了吗？这是一种我特制的鱼饵。#$b#这是最顶级的货色……连我自己都想吃！#$b#给，这是我的配方。"/pause 500/playSound coin/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/warp farmer 29 7/playSound grassyStep/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 1000/showFrame 84/playSound reward/addCraftingRecipe Wild Bait/message "学会制作“万能鱼饵”"/pause 900/end
content.BadAnswer: speak Maru "$q 18982 null#你会那么说，肯定有原因……$a#$r 18982 50 event_robot_explain1#玛丽尔达就是一台设计用来模仿人类的机器。#$r 18982 50 event_robot_explain2#我刚才是在开玩笑。玛丽尔达应该享有自由的权力。#$r 18982 -50 event_robot_explain3#我会让她去农场里工作。"/faceDirection Maru 1/emote Maru 12/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "好啦，我该走了。感谢你今天陪我，@。$8"/globalFade/viewport -3000 -3000/changeLocation ScienceHouse/end
content.384883/f Sebastian 1000/t 1100 1700: spring_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 27 1 Sebastian 18 26 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite sebastianGarage/showFrame Sebastian 33/animate Sebastian false true 100 32 32 32 36 32 32 36 36 36 36/positionOffset Sebastian 24 16/viewport 18 25 clamp true/move farmer 5 0 0/playSound clank/move farmer 0 -1 1/pause 100/playSound clank/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 300/playSound clank/pause 800/stopAnimation Sebastian/showFrame Sebastian 35/animate Sebastian false false 100 32 33 34 35/playSound dwoop/pause 500/speak Sebastian "哦，你好啊，@。$8"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 8/pause 400/speak Sebastian "什么，你还没有见识过我的摩托车？唔……可能是我没有给你看过。$8"/pause 900/showFrame Sebastian 32/animate Sebastian false false 100 35 34 33 32/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/animate Sebastian false true 200 32 32 32 36 32 32 36 36 36/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 300/pause 800/playSound parry/pause 800/playSound clank/playMusic echos/pause 2000/glow 80 70 255 true/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "有时候，在太阳下山以后，我就会骑着它，开出星露谷好远……$8"/pause 800/speak Sebastian "顺着空旷的公路，向着城里微弱的灯光，一路狂飙，这个感觉无与伦比……$9"/pause 200/playSound clank/pause 500/playSound clank/pause 200/speak Sebastian "等我存够了钱，就要一个人出去闯荡……我要和我的摩托，去比城里还远的地方。就只有我和我的摩托车。$9"/pause 900/playSound clank/pause 900/stopAnimation Sebastian/playSound Milking/pause 1500/stopGlowing/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Sebastian "好了，油已经换过了。$8"/pause 1200/showFrame Sebastian 35/animate Sebastian false false 100 32 33 34 35/playSound dwoop/pause 1900/speak Sebastian "$q -1 null#嘿……如果你想骑的话，我或许可以让你骑一下。$8^嘿……或许我能找个时间带你兜兜风。$8#$r -1 10 event_garage1#听起来很有趣。#$r -1 -10 event_garage2#不用了，谢谢。我觉得不怎么样。#$r -1 0 event_garage3#我很怕摩托车。"/pause 900/viewport move 1 -1 8000/pause 4000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

farmer 0 -5 0/speak Sebastian "嘿，@。我正要出发呢。#$b#上来……我想给你看样东西。"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer 1 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap 600/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "当我想要逃避一切的时候，就会来到这里，一个人……静静。"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 600/animate Sebastian false true 110 16 17 18 19 20 21 21 21 21 21 21 21 21 22 23 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1800/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/speak Sebastian "$q -1 null#那么，你觉得怎么样？#$r -1 0 event_city1#好美啊。#$r -1 10 event_city2#这让我有一种莫名的伤感。#$r -1 -10 event_city3#有点儿丑。#$r -1 0 event_city4#你该戒烟了。"/stopAnimation Sebastian/pause 600/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 3000/speak Sebastian "曾经，我对城里的生活很是着迷……但现在我觉得，在这山谷的老家里，我会更加快乐。"/pause 500/pause 900/speak Sebastian "@……？$s#$b#呃……我从来没对……别人有过这种感觉……但你与众不同。$l^我很少带女孩子来这里……其实，你是唯一一个。$l#$b#你知道我想说什么，对不对？$l"/pause 700/faceDirection farmer content.404798/Hn ccFishTank: spring_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 42 11 0 Willy 47 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite dickBag/viewport 47 5 clamp true/emote Willy 8/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 500/speak Willy "嗨，@。"/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 0/speak Willy "好奇怪……我不知道这块儿圆石是怎么消失的。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Willy "这条小溪的源头在深山里面。"/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite dickGlitter/playSound slosh/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/jump Willy/pause 800/emote Willy 16/speak Willy "嘿！你看到水里那个闪闪发亮的东西了吗？"/pause 800/showFrame Willy 24/pause 250/showFrame Willy 25/pause 1000/speak Willy "对……那是块优质矿石！$h"/showFrame Willy 24/pause 200/showFrame Willy 0/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 3/speak Willy "肯定是水流把它从山里带出来的。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Willy "你知道这意味着什么吗？"/pause 900/jump Willy/pause 800/speak Willy "这意味着我们可以开始淘矿石了！$h"/faceDirection Willy 2/faceDirection Willy 3/speak Willy "给，我的背包里还有一个淘盘……你就用这个吧？"/pause 800/faceDirection Willy 1/pause 800/showFrame Willy 26/pause 500/playSound coin/pause 500/showFrame Willy 4/pause 500/showFrame Willy 12/faceDirection Willy 3/awardFestivalPrize Pan/null/pause 800/faceDirection Willy 2/speak Willy "只要在水里见到发光的矿石，就用淘盘捞上来看看。"/faceDirection farmer 2/itemAboveHead pan/null/pause 1000/end
content.371652/f Linus 2000/w sunny/t 600 1700/a: sweet/18 32/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Robin -1000 -1000 2 Linus 23 33 1/skippable/animate Linus false true 250 20 21/pause 3000/doAction 24 33/pause 500/doAction 24 33/pause 800/doAction 24 33/pause 1000/stopAnimation Linus/move Linus -2 0 0/move Linus 0 -1 1/animate Linus false true 250 20 21/pause 500/doAction 22 32/pause 900/doAction 22 32/pause 200/doAction 22 32/pause 1200/stopAnimation Linus/move Linus -6 0 0/move Linus 0 -5 0 true/viewport move 0 -1 4000/move false/move Linus -2 0 3/warp Robin 12 26/playSound doorClose/pause 400/showFrame Robin 19/textAboveHead Robin "呀！"/shake Robin 500/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 0/showFrame Robin 0/pause 1 500/warp farmer 11 26/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Linus 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 1000/speak Robin "哦……是莱纳斯，对吧？$s"/emote Robin 40/speak Robin "你饿了吗？我可以为你做午饭……剩下的洞穴胡萝卜汤，怎么样？"/pause 500/speak Linus "你真好，但是不用了，谢谢！我今天找东西吃的运气很好。$h"/pause 1000/speak Robin "嘿……好吧。$5"/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 3/pause 500/speak Robin "@？你看起来像有话要说……"/pause 500/question fork0 "#我只是想说莱纳斯干得不错，这让我很高兴……#我想邀请莱纳斯和我一起住在农场里……"/pause 100/fork linusWell/faceDirection Robin 2 true/textAboveHead Robin "哇！"/showFrame Linus 22/jump Linus/pause 2000/showFrame Linus 0/pause 1000/showFrame Linus 0/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "这么慷慨！真是个好主意！我可以为你建造一间舒适的真房子，莱纳斯。$h"/move Robin 0 1 1/speak Robin "你终于要有自来水、暖气、屋顶了……就像我们其他人一样！是不是很棒，莱纳斯？"/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 1000/showFrame Linus 19/pause 1000/speak Linus "呃……$s#$b#嗯……不用了，谢谢。$s"/playSound thudStep/showFrame Robin 19/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/playSound woodWhack/textAboveHead Robin "什么..？"/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/emote Linus 28/playMusic echos/speak Linus "我很感激你的善意……真的很……$s#$b#但……我以前告诉过你……我选择以这种方式生活……"/pause 500/showFrame Linus 0/move Linus 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Linus "大多数时候我喜欢独处……我喜欢天籁之音……随着大自然的节奏起伏……#$b#这是让我舒适的一种生活方式。我从未想过要改变这一点。"/showFrame Linus 0/pause 500/move Linus 0 -1 3/faceDirection Linus 3/showFrame Robin 0/pause 1000/speak Robin "我想我从来没有这样想过……$5"/move Linus 0 1 3/move Linus -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Linus "@……我非常珍惜我们的友谊。而且我知道你也是。$h#$b#但……你不需要尝试“帮助”我……我最清楚怎样过自己的生活……好吗？"/move Linus -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3/emote farmer 60/speak Linus "……你闻到了吗？这是成熟浆果的甜香味……$h"/jump Linus/speed Linus 4/move Linus -4 0 3/move Linus 0 -10 0 true/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 2000/end
content.linusWell: pause 100/friendship Linus 250/move Linus 0 1 3/move Linus -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Robin 2/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Linus "谢谢，@。你让我担心了，……我以为你会邀请我和你一起搬去农场！*眨眼*#$b#你知道，我将你视作星露谷中最亲密的朋友……你从来没有试图“修正”我……你尊重我的生活方式，即使你无法理解。$h#$b#我真的很感激。"/move Linus -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3/emote farmer 32/speak Linus "啊……你能闻到吗？这是成熟浆果的甜香味……$h"/jump Linus/speed Linus 4/move Linus -4 0 3/move Linus 0 -10 0 true/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 500/speak Robin "噢……多么甜心……$h"/pause 1000/end
content.5183338/e 3917666/O Maru/w sunny/t 2200: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 23 29 3 Maru 14 29 3/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap NightSceneMaruMap2 false/bgColor 0 0 0/ambientLight 0 0 0/viewport 14 25 true clamp/pause 1000/move farmer -8 0 3/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 800/showFrame Maru 32/pause 700/showFrame Maru 4/speak Maru "嘿，@。你来得正好……彗星就要出现了。"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Maru "这夜空真美丽，是不是？"/pause 2000/faceDirection Maru 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/speak Maru "还记得我们第一次来观星吗？已经是挺久以前了……"/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "那天晚上我差点就把真正的心意说出来了……但我担心你会拒绝我。"/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "谁知道之后我们这么快就结婚了！$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/jump Maru/pause 400/speak Maru "哦！要来了……"/faceDirection Maru 3/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame Maru 28/emote Maru 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead Maru "哇哦！"/pause 3000/showFrame Maru 12/move Maru 0 1 0/speak Maru "快看！"/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 1000/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playMusic spaceMusic/warp Maru 15 29/faceDirection Maru 3/cutscene marucomet/pause 1000/viewport 14 25 true clamp/pause 3000/stopAnimation farmer/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Maru "看到彗星之后，按照惯例该许个愿……"/pause 500/quickQuestion 你会许什么愿？#生一个新的宝宝#我们能一同变老#挣更多的钱(break)jump Maru\pause 500\speak Maru "哦！我们当然可以去努力一下……$l"\emote Maru 20(break)emote Maru 20\speak Maru "那真是太棒了！$l#$b#我的愿望也是这个。$l"(break)speak Maru "钱？好吧……$s#$b#我觉得这很实际……$8"\emote Maru 28\speak Maru "我的愿望会更浪漫一点……"/pause 2000/animate Maru false true 100 28/animate farmer false true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 16 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 15 29/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite maruTelescope/viewport move 0 -1 13000/pause 16000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 3000/end newDay
content.9333219/O Sebastian/f Sebastian 3500/w r: rain/48 36/farmer 49 31 2 Sebastian 50 36 3/makeInvisible 44 31 5 5/addConversationTopic sebastianFrog 0/skippable/move farmer 0 4 2/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "嘿，@……很高兴你来了。"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "有一只受伤的青蛙在灌木丛中……我要去救他！"/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "我需要你的帮助。去那边的灌木丛里试试让他朝我这个方向过来。我会在这里等着抓住他。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 3/move farmer -5 0 2/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 54/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/speak Sebastian "好……你准备好了吗？"/emote farmer 56/textAboveHead Sebastian "就是现在！"/pause 500/doAction 44 36/pause 1000/doAction 44 36/pause 1000/doAction 44 36/playSound croak/specificTemporarySprite sebastianFrog/pause 10000/playSound coin/showFrame Sebastian 55/jump Sebastian/textAboveHead Sebastian "抓住他了！"/move farmer 5 0 2/move farmer 0 1 1/speak Sebastian "可怜的小家伙……他的腿都伤成这样了。$s"/emote farmer 28/quickQuestion #我们应该怎么做？#我要收养他……#我不认为他会成功自愈#让我们护理他，帮助他恢复健康！(break)speak Sebastian "我现在要把他带回家，让他感觉更舒适些。#$b#我想应该去了解一下关于如何照顾青蛙。也许玛妮知道一些。"(break)speak Sebastian "哈……好的，我觉得可以。$h#$b#他一定深受你喜爱……$7"\faceDirection farmer 2 true\jump farmer\showFrame farmer 94\startJittering(break)emote Sebastian 12\speak Sebastian "好吧，如果你不同意的话我很抱歉……但我想给这个可怜的小家伙一个机会。"(break)speak Sebastian "我们一定会竭尽所能，但小心现在别一直粘着他……"/pause 300/stopJittering/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Sebastian "我们带他回家吧。"/pause 500/playSound croak/pause 2000/end
content.8357109/w sunny/t 600 1900/n linusTrashC: spring_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Linus 63 21 2/skippable/hideShadow Linus true/showFrame Linus 24/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 129 241 14 15 60 20/viewport 63 21 true/pause 5000/speak Linus "啊……感觉真不错。$4"/pause 1000/speak Linus "这里的水从来都不会变得更干净。$4"/pause 2000/speak Linus "……我也不会变得更干净！嘿嘿嘿。$5"/pause 3000/end
